title: Client unresponsive in ChampSelect ONLY
body:
I'm currently trying to do some ranked with a friend and for ranked ONLY the client becomes completely unresponsive for the duration of champion select. It's not doing this for any bot games, normal que, ARAM etc, and isn't doing this on my other account. IS there

a) A cause for why this is happening 
b) A way i can restore the MMR lost because of the forced dodging

replies.body:
That's weird. Have you tried repairing your client?

I truly don't know why that would happen. Generally, you test stuff in normals and then go to ranked, because normals simulates the exact same environment (technologically wise) that ranked would bring.

I'd like to get a red in on this. Could you repost this on the Misc. boards and then link me?
